overview:
Mehul Patel has within a short span of time created a mark for himself as a New Media consultant of repute. He has been instrumental in co-founding and managing several innovative enterprises in the New Media and Social Media space like KIPL.Net - A Turnkey New Media, Digital and Social media consulting firm, Mozomo.mobi – a designer mobile content / Mobile VAS firm, he has been a part of D7TV – a mobile TV start up based out of San Francisco California, he is also a founding partner of – Network Prive

He was recently rated as Top 100 influencers in India on Twitter / Social Media by Pinstorm - http://pinstorm.com/ii/

MumbaiBoss has termed him as one of Mumbai’s resident Celeb Twitter – http://mumbaiboss.com/tag/mehul-patel/

He has several cutting edge technology and digital trend forecasting write ups to his credit and is a regular guest columnist for leading publications like Sun UK, Bombay Times, Men’s Health and Mid-day

Mehul has over 13 years of experience in managing Digital, Web 2.0, Social Media Marketing & Value Added Service businesses. He has launched and managed several new and established ventures and services across Digital media and has managed large teams and partnerships across India, Asia and USA.

He has been quoted as the innovator of the Designer Mobile Content by Mobile Monday Finland.

He is currently managing global operations of http://KIPL.Net as CEO and is a founding partner in Network Prive - http://facebok.com/NetworkPrive and http://NetworkPrive.com
